# Q&A


1. git globa options

    ```git
    # show global options
    git config --list

    # set git editor
    git config --global core.editor "code --wait"
    git config -e 
    git config --global -e 



    ```

2. get git status short

    ```git
    git status 
    git status -s

    ```

3. create new branch 


    ```git
    # create new brance
    git checkout -b <newbranch>

    # back to mater
    git checkout master

    # merge new brache into master(should be in master branche)
    git merge <newbranch>

    ```

4. clone with ssh


    ```git
    git clone username@ip_adress:/home/username/gitpath

    ```
